channel.title: Again
channel.description: Ok i know i've posted this before but i have never gotten a straight answer. I have been struggling making any weapon look likes its sharp and i believe that there is a much more efficent way of doing it than i am. Can someone tell me the [b]BEST[/b] way to make a weapon look like its sharp?

item.title: Again
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:2, topic:282718”][quote author=owned654321241 link=topic=373610.msg2818113#msg2818113 date=1244405469]
Ok i know i’ve posted this before but i have never gotten a straight answer.
I have been struggling making any weapon look likes its sharp and i believe that there is a much more efficent way of doing it than i am.
Can someone tell me the BEST way to make a weapon look like its sharp?
[/quote]
the move tool.[/quote]
that works… but u can also make a edge of it (and keep the original blade shape) by making lines a little off the part of the blade u want to be sharp… and use that line to make a new edge on it (blade will be slightly larger on appearance)

Read full topic
